mapper.sql: goods_id, category_id, goods_name, goods_price, goods_image, goods_describe, goods_total_amount, shops_name
mapper.insert:
insert into goods
goods_id,
category_id,
goods_name,
goods_price,
goods_image,
goods_describe,
goods_total_amount,
shops_name,
#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
#{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update goods
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL},
goods_image = #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_describe = #{goodsDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_total_amount = #{goodsTotalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shops_name = #{shopsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, goods_image = #{goodsImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_describe = #{goodsDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_total_amount = #{goodsTotalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shops_name = #{shopsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update goods set goods_image=#{newimage} where goods_name=#{newname}
mapper.select: select goods_id as goodsID,goods_name as goodsName,goods_price as goodsPrice,goods_image as goodsImage, goods_describe as goodsDescribe,shops_name as shopsName from goods where goods_name=#{goodsname}
select goods_id as goodsID,goods_name as goodsName,goods_price as goodsPrice,goods_image as goodsImage, goods_describe as goodsDescribe,shops_name as shopsName from goods

select goods.goods_id as goodsID,goods.goods_name as goodsName,goods.goods_price as goodsPrice,goods.goods_image as goodsImage, goods.goods_describe as goodsDescribe,goods.shops_name as shopsName from goods,shops where shops.users_name=#{usersname} and shops.shops_name=goods.shops_name
